body_html: @Response777 What was your problem with fully_connected layer and how did you fix it? I was transferring a model from PyTroch to TensorFlow and observed a decrease in performance. I also used the tf.contrib.layers.fully_connected to replace the Pytorch nn.Linear, so I wonder if I ran into the same issue.
body_text: @Response777 What was your problem with fully_connected layer and how did you fix it? I was transferring a model from PyTroch to TensorFlow and observed a decrease in performance. I also used the tf.contrib.layers.fully_connected to replace the Pytorch nn.Linear, so I wonder if I ran into the same issue.
body: @Response777 What was your problem with fully_connected layer and how did you fix it? I was transferring a model from PyTroch to TensorFlow and observed a decrease in performance. I also used the tf.contrib.layers.fully_connected to replace the Pytorch nn.Linear, so I wonder if I ran into the same issue.
